http://vimeo.com/140515752

Today, we’d like to take a few moments and talk to you about the importance of having an updated, professional headshot. It’s a small investment that has the ability to pay off in exponential dividends. A proper headshot allows you to showcase your professionalism, both inside and out, with a winning photograph.

Do you remember the old saying “Never judge a book by its cover?” Well here’s a reality check. The real world very much judges by the way things and people look. This holds especially true when it comes to professional situations involving job interviews, making connections and networking. This points to the fact that we have a short amount of time to make a good first impression.

Whether you are an actor, lawyer, doctor, realtor or any other professional designation, do not overlook your headshot! If you Google “LinkedIn headshots Toronto”, you will find out that we, A Nerd’s World, ranks at the top as #1. This shows you how serious we are about aspects such as actors headshots Toronto.

Headshot Toronto

The A Nerd’s World photography studio is located at 688 Richmond Street, Unit 304, in Toronto. We are offering professional headshots to everyone, for a no-strings-attached price of $100+tax. Come on by for your session, walk-ins are always welcome! We’ve got 3 professional photographers on staff that all shoot with top-of-the-line Canon products. On top of that, we’ve got the latest in lighting systems from Profoto, to ensure even, smooth exposure of all subjects in front of our camera lens.

You will not find a better headshot Toronto studio around. We are an honest bunch of nerds that are on a mission to help improve professionals’ business presences and to help generate more successful first impressions.

Want to know more about us? Have questions about the best Headshot Toronto? Do not hesitate to send us a message or give us a call: (647) 726-2020.

Chris A. Hughes
